mapper.select: select c.roleName, e.permission from employee a left join userrole b on a.id = b.userId left join sysrole c on b.roleId = c.id left join rolepermission d on c.id = d.roleId left join syspermission e on d.permissionId = e.id where a.empName = #{userName} and b.invalid = '0' and c.invalid = '0' and d.invalid = '0' and e.invalid = '0'
